meanings.sent1: I am uninstalling the old game from my computer.
meanings.sent2: She always uninstalls unnecessary programs to free up space.
meanings.sent3: Uninstalling this app feels like cleaning out a messy room.
meanings.sent4: His decision to uninstall the software was like cutting ties with the past.
meanings.sent5: The process of uninstalling can make your computer run faster.

meanings.definition: The act of removing software from a computer.
meanings.sent1: After the uninstalling, the computer ran more smoothly.
meanings.sent2: I watched the uninstalling of the program with interest.
meanings.sent3: The uninstalling of the software was like saying goodbye to an old friend.
meanings.sent4: The uninstalling process can sometimes be frustrating.
meanings.sent5: The uninstalling caused a noticeable change in the computer's performance.
